title: Episode 21 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: A detailed review of One Piece Episode 21, focusing on Sanji's character development and his compassionate act of feeding Gin. The article analyzes Sanji's strength of character and his belief that nobody should suffer from hunger.

title: One Piece; Why Baratie Arc is a Masterpiece
author: The Birds of Hermes
description: A comprehensive analysis of the Baratie Arc, including discussion of Sanji feeding Gin and the thematic significance of this moment. The article explores three core themes: power and strength, following dreams, and respect for food. Analyzes how Sanji's past with Zeff informs his actions.

title: Episode 21 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for One Piece Episode 21, including episode information, synopsis, character debuts, trivia, and production details.

title: Exploring One Piece's East Blue Saga: Baratie Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: An exploration of the Baratie Arc within the East Blue Saga, covering the introduction of Sanji and the conflict with Don Krieg's crew.

title: One Piece: Baratie Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Summary, recap, and review of the entire Baratie Arc, including the iconic moment when Sanji feeds Gin and its significance to the story.

title: BARATIE ARC - Anime web
author: Straw Hat Pirates Blog
description: A fan blog covering the Baratie Arc with analysis of key moments and character development throughout the arc.

title: Gin - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive character page for Gin, including his debut in Episode 21, his role in the Baratie Arc, and his relationship with Sanji.
